attributes.action: Reinstall the 70 mph speed limit along the A494 through Deeside.
attributes.additional_details: The pathetic excuse of air pollution levels is an obvious front to install speed cameras and scam money off the tax payer. A speed limit of 50mph is rediculous along this long stretch of 3 lane carriage way.
attributes.background: The A494 is a long 3 lane streach of carriage way and reducing the speed to 50mph along here is rediculous and makes absolutely no difference to the air pollution levels.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
